title: Waterloo farmers
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Roman Bittman, Gary Toole and Italo Costa
brief_description: This film juxtaposes Old Order Mennonites and New Order Mennonites. Their differing beliefs are reflected in their methods of farming. One has not changed in four hundred years; the other is up-to-date and mechanized. The film asks whether a compromise will eventually have to be reached between the two.
